column2: Chloe, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: This Slo-niacin works very well for me.  I had stomach problems with triglyceride medications so my doctor changed to this.  I started with 250 twice a day for a week and then doubled the next week until I was up to 750 twice a day.  I absolutely must eat and drink fluid to keep flushing at a minimum.  I also take a baby aspirin if I' not going to be home just in case.  The flushing was scary the first time but eating and a baby aspirin seem to completely eliminate it for me.  When it happens, it feels like an indian burn on my skin that's exposed to air (not sure why) and goes away after 20 minutes.

column2: tbtchygurl, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I started out on 250 mg 2x daily them was moved up to 500 mg 2x daily. I have been on this treatment for several months and just recently have experienced side effects. Did not have a problem before so I do not understand why all of a sudden it is doing this. Went to ER because of it and have scheduled a follow up with Dr. do not like the extreme heat and dizzy feeling. It does not happen all the time either so no way to predict when it will happen. If I could plan around it it might be different. Have had shortness of breath and swelling in legs as well as spike in blood sugar levels. At this point I am very concerned. I will learn to live with it if it is determined that it is lowering triglyceride and cholesterol levels because they are so out of control I end up in hospital with pancreatitis.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have suffered from high cholesterol for my entire adult life.  After spending years on statins and taking excessive amounts of pain killers for the muscle pain, my doctor told me that I really could not tolerate the statins.  With total cholesterol nearing 500 and low HDL giving me a terrible ratio, I started on SLO-Niacin.  I have been on it for about 5 months.  I experienced the itching and hives-like feelings for awhile until my body adjusted to it.  I still have occasional bouts of flushing if I take the Slo-Niacin too soon after having an occasional glass of wine with dinner.  Other that that, I am very pleased.  My total cholesterol is now in the upper 300's and still coming down.  My ratio is now normal. I started with 500mg and increased to 750mg twice a day.  I am very pleased with this product.

column2: lyle holm, 75 or over Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I am 91 years old. about 20 years ago I had a heart bypass operation and after a short span i started having angina pains again I was treated by adding stents to my heart veins. That helped for several years before they started all over again. My heart doctor recommended that I take slo-niacin 500 MG's Tab twice daily and after a very short while my angina pain stopped and has never retutned. About 3 weeks ago I started havin Bowel Problems I was neither constipated or loose bowel but I could not control my bowel movement. there was a contant sepage and I had absoluutely no control.  I could not make it start or make it stop.I went to my regular doctor and after looking over my medications he said that he was quite sure that it was my slo-niacin that was causing it. He asked me to stop taking it and I rebelled. Let me backtrack a bit, I have been taking one regular asprin every day for all these years, trying to avoid more heart problems and also to avoid the Flushing caused by the slo-niacin. Just prior to my bowel problem my heart doctor told me to stop the regular asprin daily and start taking a baby asprin every other day. I told my regular doctor this and he said well try going back to your original dosage and see what happens That was last monday and yesterday I had what I would call a normal bm for the first time in a long time. I don't have any idea if this is just my body playing tricks or if there is a fix hear. Time will tell. About three weeks ago
